Mr. MURPHY. Mr. President, pursuant to section 36(b) of the Arms  Export Control Act, I move to discharge the Committee on Foreign  Relations from further consideration of S.J. Res. 54, as provided under  the previous order.

Mr. MURPHY. Mr. President,…
